title: Who's up for some Christmas games tonight?
body:
Christmas/snow skins only, and must have discord.
I would play with friends but all of them seem to actually have family and (Other) friends to spend the days with.
(there on holidays)

So who ever else who doesn't have anyone to spend Christmas (before) days with, lets have some fun.

replies.body:
I don't have RP. I'm just a RPless noob D:... {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
I also like your icon... HOW DO PPL SAVE UP ENOUGH TO GET IT?

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=72E46LTG,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-12-23T05:38:33.169+0000)
>
> Christmas/snow skins only, and must have discord.

Welp.
